text: Edwin H. Galloway was a member of the Wisconsin State Assembly. ==Biography== Galloway was born in 1825. By trade, he worked in lumber, real estate and banking. He died in 1876. ==Political career== Galloway was a member of the Assembly during the 1863 and 1864 sessions. He was a Republican. ==References== Category:Politicians from Fond du Lac, Wisconsin Category:Members of the Wisconsin State Assembly Category:Wisconsin Republicans Category:Businesspeople in timber Category:American real estate businesspeople Category:American bankers Category:1825 births Category:1876 deaths Category:19th-century American politicians
title: Edwin H. Galloway
